item.description:
This will be a 4 hour workshop on using Photoshop Elements.  It will be on the 7th and 14th from 7-9 pm.  I will be using version 10 but any version close to that will work fine for you.  You may bring a laptop to follow along if you want but it's not necessary you could just watch.  I'm offering this class at a discounted rate because some of my members asked for a Photoshop class.  This class is regularly $150 for 3 hours.

We will cover the layout and functions of the file menu, tool, pallets etc...

basics of painting and drawing

basic image and color correction

cloning

healing

saving correctly

dodging and burning

using layers

layer masks

blending modes

adding text

using actions

processing a raw file

etc...

There must be at least 2 people registered by 1/6 for this class to run.
item.name: Introduction to Photoshop Elements for Photographers
